availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hiram Newton Humble (Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer )

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer. Harrison County, Kentucky, native. Son of Squire Humble. Married to M. Angeline Allender Humble in Pendleton County, Kentucky, on December 15, 1859. Father of Mary N. Humble. Farmer with his father and brothers in Harrison County in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 1, p. 73B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Precinct 3, p. 439A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Pendleton County Marriages, Film #000272799.
"Newton Hiram Humble (1834-1896)," Find A Grave, Memorial #75266652, accessed September 7, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/75266652.
